name: Wizard-99
description:
Wizard-99 is a text-based RPG/adventure with some minigames in development.

Explore a magical world, help the people you come across, fight monsters, sip tea, and dwelve into robotics and debunked medicine!

All mechanics are currently implemented. Right now, some zones can be explored and you can try all of the minigames.

If you want the game to fit better on your screen, and play without the game description and itchio topbar getting in the middle, consider playing on selenitehermit.com. Both versions are exactly the same, (technically it's not even a different version).

Have fun! < : ) --✦
